item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Guillaume, a French Cyber Security SRE . I’m also performing Security Audit (known as Pentest) from time to time. Before that, I have worked as an Agile Web developer for a consulting company. I’m a French Certified First Responder volunteers and trainers. I started in 2009 with a first aid certificate and continued with a trainer diploma. I also assist competitors or spectators during sports competitions, concerts, or in case of disasters.
